moves.2... c6 3. e3: Not really wanting to go d4 - transfer to the Slav.
moves.3... Bg4 4. h3 Bh5 5. d4: Now it looks like a Queens Gambit.
moves.8. cxd5 exd5 9. Be2: ?Why didn't I go there instead of Bd3? 'Gosh, I'm dumb!'
moves.11. Nd2 Bxe2 12. Qxe2: Now, I like Nxe2 instead of Qxe2 - what do you think?
moves.12... Qe7 13. b3 Bc7 14. Bb2 Qd6: AHHHH!!! Not my king. I'll get him into the battle when I want too - not you :)
moves.16... Ng5: If Nxg5 Qh2+ followed by Qh1 MATE!!
moves.20... Bd6 21. Bb2: Gee, why don't I want to trade?
moves.21... Nf6 22. Ke2:
King - I want to join
The rest of the army - NOOOO!!
moves.25... Qd7 26. Ba3: My bishop is back to a3 AGAIN....
moves.29. Qg4 f5 30. Qh5 Qe7 31. Kg1 g6: Now look, I have to move my queen - and I liked that  spot.
moves.32. Qh6: Now my queen is out of the battle - or so it seems....
moves.32... Nxf2: ! Brilliant! I wish I made that move - or even saw it coming.
moves.34. Rc3: ! Only way to save my queen.
moves.34... Bxc3 35. Nxc3 Qb4 36. h4: My only hope: RUN YOU SLOW PAWN!!!
moves.37... Qc2+ 38. Kg3: King - HAHA! I got my wish.
moves.38... Re4 39. Kh3 Rg4 40. Rg1: Wow! Am I in trouble or what?
moves.40... Re8 41. Ba3 Qxa4: ? A waste of time - he should keep up the attack
moves.44. h5 Qe4 45. Nf2: ! WOW! I don't even care if my king is in trouble :)
moves.45... Rh4+ 46. Kg3: King - Haha! Now this is what I call living.
moves.47... gxh5 48. Nxe4 fxe4 49. Ra1: Now I have to stop those darn pawns!
moves.51. dxc5 Rxe5: ?? Now he can't stop me from promoting.

gameName: All your piece's must  play a part in the game
